backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing player profiles with settings and best scores, supporting save, update, read, and admin-only full export.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to impacted files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing concise summaries of all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and dark mode theme definitions for the app.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root wrapping GameScreen in a dark-mode ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/game/abilities/useShieldAbi: Zustand-based shield ability store enabling shield deployment with cooldowns.
frontend/src/game/aim/AimAssistSystem.ts: Aim assist class nudging aim toward visible enemy hit zones via raycasting.
frontend/src/game/audio/AudioManager.ts: Audio manager for gunshot and headshot sounds respecting user volume settings.
frontend/src/game/bots/BotCharacter.tsx: AI bot that moves in a pattern, casts rays to shoot the player, and exposes invisible hit zones for damage detection.
frontend/src/game/bots/BotManager.tsx: Spawns three BotCharacter instances at preset positions.
frontend/src/game/camera/ThirdPersonCame: Smoothly follows the player and adjusts FOV based on ADS state.
frontend/src/game/combat/hitDetection.ts: Performs a center-screen raycast to detect hits on head or body and awards score.
frontend/src/game/combat/RecoilSystem.ts: Handles recoil accumulation and decay, returning vertical and horizontal offsets per shot.
frontend/src/game/combat/useWeaponSystem: Runs firing logic, recoil application, ammo updates, audio, and hit detection each frame.
frontend/src/game/controls/useDesktopCon: Maps keyboard and mouse input to movement, firing, ADS, jumping, crouching, and weapon actions.
frontend/src/game/controls/useMobileCont: Placeholder hook for future mobile control logic.
frontend/src/game/GameCanvas.tsx: R3F canvas with physics, player, bots, camera rig, lighting, and shield manager.
frontend/src/game/GameScreen.tsx: Initializes player profile and settings before rendering the game canvas and HUD.
frontend/src/game/player/PlayerControlle: Handles player physics, movement, jumping, and syncing player model position/rotation.
Stub component where post-processing can be re-enabled later.
frontend/src/game/state/gameStore.ts: Zustand store managing player state, combat data, weapons, health, score, and actions.
frontend/src/game/state/qualityStore.ts: Zustand store for graphics quality presets and shadow/pixel ratio settings.
frontend/src/game/state/settingsStore.ts: Zustand settings store for sensitivity, audio, and quality preferences, with update helpers.
frontend/src/game/vfx/MuzzleFlash.tsx: Placeholder component for weapon muzzle flash effects.
frontend/src/game/world/ArenaMap.tsx: Defines ground plane and several static cover boxes with physics bodies.
frontend/src/game/world/LightingRig.tsx: Sets up ambient, directional, and hemisphere lighting with optional shadows.
frontend/src/game/world/ShieldWall.tsx: Creates a static translucent shield wall physics object at a given position and rotation.
frontend/src/game/world/ShieldWallManage: Renders active shields and updates their cooldown each frame.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines player-related queries and mutations using the actor to load profiles, save settings, and update scores.
Renders touch‑based action buttons for firing, ADS, movement, weapon cycling, reload, and shield activation.
frontend/src/hud/controls/SettingsButton: Displays a button that opens the settings panel overlay.
frontend/src/hud/controls/ShieldButton.t: Button for deploying the shield ability with cooldown visualization and disabled state handling.
frontend/src/hud/controls/VirtualStick.t: Implements a touch‑controlled virtual joystick that updates player movement based on touch position.
frontend/src/hud/HUD.tsx: Composes the full HUD layout by rendering health, ammo, score, minimap, crosshair, and control widgets.
frontend/src/hud/layout/HUDLayout.tsx: Provides a fixed overlay layout container for HUD elements.
frontend/src/hud/widgets/AmmoCounter.tsx: Shows current weapon ammo, name, and reload state.
frontend/src/hud/widgets/Crosshair.tsx: Displays a dynamic crosshair that changes size when ADS is active.
frontend/src/hud/widgets/HealthBar.tsx: Renders the player's health bar and numeric values.
frontend/src/hud/widgets/MiniMap.tsx: Displays a minimap frame with a player orientation indicator.
frontend/src/hud/widgets/ScorePanel.tsx: Shows the player's score and headshot count in a compact panel.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables, and global styles including body, canvas, and range input styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/persistence/playerProfileRe: Manages loading, saving, and clearing player profiles in localStorage.
frontend/src/persistence/usePlayerProfil: React hook that syncs player profile, settings, and best scores between backend, game state, and local storage.
frontend/src/ui/AuthControls.tsx: UI component for login/logout using Internet Identity with loading state and error handling.
frontend/src/ui/SettingsPanel.tsx: Displays settings UI including best records, aim options, audio, and quality settings with close controls.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, typography, and theme settings based on CSS variables.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, high-level goals, architectural notes, and a list of implemented gameplay features for a 3D third‑person shooter. Includes versioning info, target platforms, and detailed feature entries for movement, shooting, bots, and environment.
